name: King's Lost Crown (Armyth)
description:
REGAIN YOUR POWER AND KINGDOM!

The king has been overthrown from his kingdom and his 6 crowns have been thrown off at different levels in the king's dungeon. In order to gain back your power and rule the kingdom again, enter the dungeon and collect the crowns.

This is short mini-game with 6 levels which was created as a project and an attempt to learn the game engine GODOT. The assets used in this project are free-to-use assets available online by some really talented people.

Controls:-

WASD = Move (For Level Select)

A/D = Left/Right

Space = Jump

You can see the Devlogs of the following project in this playlist

For any query, suggestions, please comment or contact @its_armyth
